title: Artificer (Class)
excerpt: Masters of invention, artificers use ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

subEntries.title: Alchemist (Artificer Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: An expert at combining reagents to produce mystical effects, from healing elixirs to volatile concoctions.

subEntries.title: Armorer (Artificer Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Modifies armor to function as a second skin, enhancing magic, defense, and unleashing potent attacks.

subEntries.title: Artificer Infusions
subEntries.excerpt: Extraordinary processes that rapidly turn a nonmagical object into a magic item, available to the Artificer class.

subEntries.title: Artificer Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The spells available to the Artificer class.

subEntries.title: Artillerist (Artificer Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Specializes in using magic to hurl energy, projectiles, and explosions with a magical cannon.

subEntries.title: Battle Smith (Artificer Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: A combination of protector and medic, accompanied by a protective steel defender of their own creation.

title: Barbarian (Class)
excerpt: A fierce warrior who channels primal fury to become a devastating force on the battlefield, often shunning heavy armor for agility and raw power.

subEntries.title: Path of the Berserker (Barbarian Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Channel Rage into violent fury, unleashing devastating attacks.

subEntries.title: Path of the Wild Heart (Barbarian Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Walk in community with the animal world, gaining animalistic powers.

subEntries.title: Path of the World Tree (Barbarian Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Trace the roots and branches of the multiverse, drawing on the World Tree's vitality and power of travel.

subEntries.title: Path of the Zealot (Barbarian Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Rage in ecstatic union with a god, channeling divine fury into your strikes.

title: Bard (Class)
excerpt: A master of song, speech, and the magic they contain, Bards use their artistic talents to work magic, inspire allies, and manipulate foes, often specializing in lore and versatile skills.

subEntries.title: Bard Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Bard class.

subEntries.title: College of Dance (Bard Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Move in harmony with the cosmos, emphasizing agility, speed, and grace.

subEntries.title: College of Glamour (Bard Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Weave beguiling Fey magic, cloaking yourself in otherworldly majesty.

subEntries.title: College of Lore (Bard Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Plumb the depths of magical knowledge, collecting spells and secrets from diverse sources.

subEntries.title: College of Valor (Bard Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Sing the deeds of ancient heroes, inspiring others to martial greatness.

title: Cleric (Class)
excerpt: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power, be it a god, a pantheon, or a divine force or philosophy.

subEntries.title: Cleric Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Cleric class.

subEntries.title: Life Domain (Cleric Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Soothe the hurts of the world by focusing on positive energy to sustain all life.

subEntries.title: Light Domain (Cleric Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Bring light to banish darkness, wielding blazing fire and divine revelation.

subEntries.title: Trickery Domain (Cleric Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Make mischief and challenge authority with magic of deception, illusion, and stealth.

subEntries.title: War Domain (Cleric Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Inspire valor and smite foes on the battlefield, offering acts of violence as prayers.

title: Druid (Class)
excerpt: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature—moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning—and adopting animal forms.

subEntries.title: Circle of the Land
subEntries.excerpt: Celebrate a connection to the natural world, safeguarding ancient knowledge and rites.

subEntries.title: Circle of the Moon
subEntries.excerpt: Adopt animal forms to guard the wilds, drawing on lunar magic to transform.

subEntries.title: Circle of the Sea
subEntries.excerpt: Become one with the tides and storms, drawing on tempestuous forces.

subEntries.title: Circle of the Stars
subEntries.excerpt: Harness secrets hidden in constellations, drawing on the powers of the cosmos.

subEntries.title: Druid Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Druid class.

title: Fighter (Class)
excerpt: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor, and known for their unparalleled prowess on the battlefield.

subEntries.title: Battle Master (Fighter Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: A master of sophisticated battle maneuvers, using tactical techniques fueled by Superiority Dice.

subEntries.title: Champion (Fighter Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: A warrior who pursues physical excellence, focusing on raw martial prowess and dealing devastating critical hits.

subEntries.title: Eldritch Knight (Fighter Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: A martial warrior who combines their combat skills with the study of arcane magic from the Wizard spell list.

subEntries.title: Psi Warrior (Fighter Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: A fighter who augments their physical might with psionic power, creating telekinetic shields and strikes.

title: Monk (Class)
excerpt: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

subEntries.title: Warrior of Mercy (Monk Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Manipulate the forces of life and death, acting as both wandering physician and swift end to your enemies.

subEntries.title: Warrior of Shadow (Monk Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Practice stealth and subterfuge, harnessing the power of the Shadowfell to hide and teleport through darkness.

subEntries.title: Warrior of the Elements (Monk Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Tap into the power of the Elemental Planes, wielding strikes and bursts of elemental power.

subEntries.title: Warrior of the Open Hand (Monk Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Masters of unarmed combat, learning techniques to push, trip, and manipulate their foes' energy.

title: Paladin (Class)
excerpt: A holy warrior bound by an oath to stand against the forces of annihilation and corruption, wielding divine power and martial skill.

subEntries.title: Oath of Devotion (Paladin Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Uphold the ideals of justice and order, acting as a knight in shining armor against the forces of darkness.

subEntries.title: Oath of Glory (Paladin Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Strive for the heights of heroism, believing you and your companions are destined for glory.

subEntries.title: Oath of the Ancients (Paladin Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Preserve life and light in the world, cherishing beauty and laughter over abstract principles.

subEntries.title: Oath of Vengeance (Paladin Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: A solemn commitment to punish those who have committed grievously evil acts.

subEntries.title: Paladin Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Paladin class.

title: Ranger (Class)
excerpt: A warrior of the wilderness who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization, often excelling in tracking and surviving in harsh environments.

subEntries.title: Beast Master (Ranger Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Form a mystical bond with a special animal, drawing on primal magic and a deep connection to the natural world.

subEntries.title: Fey Wanderer (Ranger Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Wield Fey mirth and fury, thanks to a boon from an archfey or a location in the Feywild.

subEntries.title: Gloom Stalker (Ranger Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Draw on shadow magic to fight foes in the darkest places, excelling at ambushes.

subEntries.title: Hunter (Ranger Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Stalk prey using your abilities as a Hunter to protect nature and people everywhere.

subEntries.title: Ranger Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Ranger class.

title: Rogue (Class)
excerpt: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies, excelling in skills like subterfuge, evasion, and disabling traps.

subEntries.title: Arcane Trickster (Rogue Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Enhance your roguish skills with a touch of arcane magic from the Wizard spell list, specializing in illusions and enchantments.

subEntries.title: Assassin (Rogue Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Practice the grim art of death, using stealth, poison, and disguise to eliminate foes with deadly efficiency.

subEntries.title: Soulknife (Rogue Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Strike with the power of your mind, cutting through barriers both physical and psychic with blades of pure psionic energy.

subEntries.title: Thief (Rogue Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: A mix of burglar, treasure hunter, and explorer, a Thief is the epitome of an adventurer, excelling at infiltration and using magic items.

title: Sorcerer (Class)
excerpt: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gifted bloodline or other extraordinary event, shaping reality through sheer force of will and arcane talent.

subEntries.title: Aberrant Mind
subEntries.excerpt: Wield unnatural psionic power, touching other minds and altering the world around you.

subEntries.title: Clockwork Soul
subEntries.excerpt: Channel the cosmic forces of order, equalizing chaotic moments and imbuing allies with shimmering shields.

subEntries.title: Draconic Sorcery
subEntries.excerpt: Your innate magic comes from the gift of a dragon, granting you resilience, elemental affinity, and draconic power.

subEntries.title: Sorcerer Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Sorcerer class.

subEntries.title: Wild Magic
subEntries.excerpt: Your magic stems from the raw forces of chaos, leading to unpredictable surges of untamed power.

title: Warlock (Class)
excerpt: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity, channeling otherworldly power through their pact.

subEntries.title: Archfey Patron (Warlock Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Bargain with a whimsical archfey, wielding the beguiling and terrifying magic of the Feywild.

subEntries.title: Celestial Patron (Warlock Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Call on the power of the heavens, healing allies and searing foes with holy light.

subEntries.title: Fiend Patron (Warlock Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Make a deal with the Lower Planes, gaining fiery magic and infernal resilience.

subEntries.title: Great Old One Patron (Warlock Subclass)
subEntries.excerpt: Unearth forbidden lore from ineffable beings of the Far Realm, touching other minds with alien power.

subEntries.title: Warlock Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Warlock class.

title: Wizard (Class)
excerpt: A scholarly magic-user who masters the arcane arts through intense study and manipulation of the fabric of reality.

subEntries.title: Abjurer
subEntries.excerpt: Focuses on magic that blocks, banishes, or protects, ending harmful effects and guarding against spying.

subEntries.title: Diviner
subEntries.excerpt: Strives to part the veils of space, time, and consciousness, mastering spells of discernment, remote viewing, and foresight.

subEntries.title: Evoker
subEntries.excerpt: Creates powerful elemental effects like searing flame, crackling lightning, and burning acid.

subEntries.title: Illusionist
subEntries.excerpt: Specializes in magic that dazzles the senses and tricks the mind, crafting illusions that make the impossible seem real.

subEntries.title: Wizard Spell List
subEntries.excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Wizard class.
